mobiles.name: dwarf imp
mobiles.long_description: The dwarf imp says 'Turn back, while you still can'
mobiles.description:
The dwarf imp has seen countless warriors meet their untimely demise. 
You
would be well-advised to take his advice.

mobiles.name: sentinel guard
mobiles.long_description: The Sentinel slices you Supernaturally Hard!!!!!
mobiles.description: The Sentinel slaps you, hard!

mobiles.name: sentinel guard
mobiles.long_description: The Sentinel stands here with stately pride.
mobiles.description: The Sentinel says, "If you feel froggy, jump!"

mobiles.name: dark sentinel guard
mobiles.long_description: The Dark Sentinel begins to rip you apart!
mobiles.description: The Dark Sentinel snickers softly.

mobiles.name: baby sentinel guard
mobiles.long_description: The baby sentinel bonks you.  BONK!! BONK!!
mobiles.description: The baby sentinel wandered all the way down here by mistake.

mobiles.name: light sentinel guard
mobiles.long_description: The Light Sentinel contemplates killing you.
mobiles.description: The Light Sentinel grins evilly at you.

mobiles.name: sentinel guard
mobiles.long_description: The Sentinel slices you Supernaturally Hard!!!
mobiles.description: The Sentinel slaps you, hard!

mobiles.long_description: The Sentinel slices you Supernaturally Hard!!!
mobiles.description: The Sentinel slaps you, hard!

mobiles.long_description: The Light Sentinel contemplates killing you.
mobiles.description: The Light Sentinel grins evilly at you.

mobiles.name: sentinel guard
mobiles.long_description: The Sentinel stands here with stately pride.
mobiles.description: The Sentinel says, "If you feel froggy, jump!"

mobiles.name: sentinel light guard
mobiles.long_description: The Light Sentinel is on the guard.
mobiles.description:
The Light Sentinel is well-groomed, but there seems to be a shadow on
his
face.

mobiles.name: sentinel guard
mobiles.long_description: The Sentinel is on guard.
mobiles.description: The Sentinel is well-armored, and carries a big sword.

mobiles.name: sentinel dark guard
mobiles.long_description: The dark sentinel attacks!
mobiles.description: Someone should tell this guy that he should be standing in one place!

mobiles.name: sentinel dark guard
mobiles.long_description: The Dark Sentinel prevents you from advancing.
mobiles.description: You are awed by his presence.

objects.name: azure charm seduction
objects.description: An azure charm lies on the ground.

extra_descr_data.description: You are entranced by the beauty of this charm.

objects.name: bleeding long sword
objects.description: A sword bleeds freely on the ground.

extra_descr_data.description: The sword is covered with the blood of some recent victim.
This ring is just excellent!
This charm is excellent!
This chestplate is excellent for hard battle conditions.
This helmet is excellent for protecting you from blows to the head.

objects.name: azure legplates plates leg
objects.description: A pair of fine azure legplates lies here.

extra_descr_data.description: These legplates are excellent for preventing broken knees.

objects.name: azure boots
objects.description: A pair of azure boots lies here.

extra_descr_data.description: These boots are excellent for hiking through unfriendly terrain.

objects.name: azure gloves
objects.description: A pair of azure gloves lies here.

extra_descr_data.description: These azure gloves are excellent for keeping your hands warm in cold weather.

objects.name: azure armplates arm plates
objects.description: A pair of azure armplates lies here.

extra_descr_data.description: These azure armplates are excellent!
The azure cloak protects you from the elements.
You tie an azure belt around your waist.
The azure bracelet is excellent for protecting your wrists from damage.
An azure shield deflects all of the many blows from your opponents.
An azure mask flickers in and out of existence.
This is the weapon of extreme destruction.
The sign warns you:  Turn back while you still can!

objects.name: azure charm mastery
objects.description: An azure charm of mastery lies here.

extra_descr_data.description: This magical charm glows in the dark.

rooms.name: Entrance
rooms.description: You are standing at the entrance.

extra_descr_data.description:
You see azure and gold diamonds glittering along the floor and walls.  
You must have wandered into some mystical place, that contains great treasure.

rooms.name: Archway
rooms.description: You are standing underneath a magnificent archway.

extra_descr_data.description: You see the words inscribed on a small plaque:  To all who enter, beware the sentinels!

rooms.name: Hall
rooms.description: You are in a hall.

extra_descr_data.description: You see an encrypted message:  DOH NT GEO THREW DA DOR
You look around, and you see the many skeletons of brave warriors.

rooms.name: Hall
rooms.description: You are in a hall.

extra_descr_data.description: You see an encrypted message:  DOH NT GEO THREW DA DOR
You look around, and you see the skeletons of many brave warriors.

rooms.name: End of the Hall
rooms.description: You are at the end of the hall.  You see a passage leading down.

extra_descr_data.description: You look around, and notice a sign:  Turn back while you can!

rooms.name: Room
rooms.description: You are standing in a room.  There is some scribble on the door.

extra_descr_data.description: You see an encrypted message:  U R SOFA KING STEW PEED
The floor and walls are covered with blood.

rooms.name: Room
rooms.description: You are standing in a room.  There is some scribble on the door.

extra_descr_data.description: You see an encrypted message:  U R SOFA KING STEW PEED
The floor and walls are covered with blood.

rooms.name: Room

extra_descr_data.description: You see an encrypted message:  U R SOFA KING STEW PEED
The floor and walls are covered with blood.

rooms.name: Passage
rooms.description: It only gets darker as you go down.

extra_descr_data.description: You see golden pillars, encrusted with azure gems lining your path.

rooms.name: Passage
rooms.description: The path only gets darker and darker as you go down.

extra_descr_data.description: You see golden pillars, encrusted with azure gems, lining your path.

rooms.name: Passage
rooms.description: The passage stops going down here.

extra_descr_data.description: You see golden pillars, encrusted with azure gems, lining your path.

rooms.description: You are standing in a passage.

extra_descr_data.description: You see golden pillars, encrusted with azure gems, lining your path.

rooms.name: The Darkness
rooms.description: The passage gets especially dark here.

rooms.description: You stumble around in total darkness.

extra_descr_data.description: You can't make out anything.
